msg: Present a more useful rendering of itself when toString() is called.

msg: Added digest.sh to the list of files that should be given

msg: - Remove useless thread bind / unbind (which are now all done in StandardContext).

author: remm
msg: - The manager should be able to load classes from /WEB-INF/lib during start(),
- Filters will also be able to load classes from /WEB-INF/lib during stop().

author: remm
msg: - Remove useless thread binding / unbinding during the creation of the loader.
